card.name: Lucian, Grim Purifier
card.text: Partner with Senna, the Redeemer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Senna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Lucian has double strike as long as you cast a spell this turn. Whenever Lucian attacks, he deals damage equal to his power to target tapped creature, if Lucian has double strike copy this ability, you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Kalista, Undying Wraith
card.text: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Kalista is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has “{T}: Put a spear counter on target creature opponent controls or deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of spear counters on it, excess damage dealt this way is instead dealt to its controller.”

card.name: Gnar, Primal Curiosity
card.text: Whenever this creature deals or receives damage, put a rage counter on him. Then if he has 5 or more rage counters Transform Gnar, Primal Curiosity. --- (Back): Mega Gnar, Enraged Titan

card.name: Mega Gnar, Enraged Titan
card.text: Trample If Mega Gnar deals lethal damage to a creature, return it to its owners hand instead of their graveyard. Whenever this creature deals or receives damage, remove a rage counter from him then if he has no rage counters on him transform him, no counters can be placed on him until the end of your next turn. Whenever Mega Gnar attacks, choose one: • Defending player sacrifices artifacts with total mana value X. If they can’t, destroy all their artifacts, where X is his power. • Mega Gnar deals X damage to each creature defending player controls, where X is his toughness. --- (Front): Gnar, Primal Curiosity

card.name: Xin-Zhao, Redeemed Reckoner
card.text: First strike, vigilance, mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, chose a creature blocking or blocked by Xin-Zhao prevent all damage dealt to Xin-Zhao except by the chosen creature.

card.name: Dr Mundo, Mad Practicioner
card.text: Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.) Whenever a creature you control attacks, you lose life equal to the creatures power. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Katarina, Sinister Blade
card.text: commander ninjutsu BR (BR, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.) Whenever Katarina deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, deal 3 damage divided as you choose among up to three targets.

card.name: Renata Glasc, Chem Baron
card.text: At the beginning of each opponents upkeep, goad each creature that player controls unless that player has you draw a card and make a treasure token

card.name: Ahri, Alluring Conjurist
card.text: Whenever a creature you control but don’t own attacks, get an experience counter. At the beginning of combat, gain control of target creature until end of turn with mana value less than or equal to the number of experience counters you have, it gains haste.

card.name: Amumu, Sad Mummy
card.text: Deathtouch Amumu enters the battlefield with a friendship counter. Other creatures get -2/-2 for each friendship counter on each other creature.

card.name: Ashe, Bow of Freljord
card.text: Vigilance, reach Whenever Ashe deals combat damage to a player, you may look at the top three cards of their library, put them back in any order. When you cast your third spell in a turn, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Azir, Sand Sculptor
card.text: Indestructible Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city’s blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Azir enters the battlefield or attacks, for each desert you control create a 1/1 colorless sand creature token. As long as you have the city’s blessing, deserts you control have “Sand creatures you control have +1/+1.”

card.name: Brand, Searing Pyroclast
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature or player is dealt lethal damage from a noncombat source you control, add {R} to your mana pool and exile the top card of your library, you may play that card until end of turn.

card.name: Braum, Shield of Freljord
card.text: Defender While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able. If Braum would be destroyed for the first time this turn, prevent it.

card.name: Corki, Daring Bombardier
card.text: Flying, haste Vehicles you control have haste. Whenever Corki or a vehicle you control attacks, you may give it +3/+3 if you do sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step and draw a card.

card.name: Diana, Midnight Emissary
card.text: It becomes night as Diana enters the battlefield, as long as it is night you may activate Diana’s abilities as though they had flash if you do it becomes day at the start of the next turn. [+1]: You may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, target nonland permanent an opponent controls loses all non mana abilities. [-2]: draw a card for each tapped creature an opponent controls. [-5]: You get an emblem with “As long as its night, spells you cast have flash”. Partner with Leona, Solar Herald Diana, Midnight Emissary can be your commander.

card.name: Aatrox, Imminent Apocolypse
card.text: Haste, flying, menace When Aatrox enter the battlefield on your turn, or an opponent loses the game, each opponent sacrifices a creature, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Only darkins can attack during extra combats.

card.name: Akshan, Rogue Sentinel
card.text: Double strike, vigilance, invisible (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities and can’t be blocked, This creature loses this effect if they deal damage.) Whenever a spell or effect an opponent controls destroys a creature you control, that player gains a scoundrel counter. Whenever Akshan deal combat damage to a scoundrel, remove all scoundrel counters from all players and return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Akali, Silent Reckoning
card.text: Commander ninjutsu UB (UB, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.) When Akali enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature an opponent controls dies this turn, Akali gains shroud until your next upkeep.

card.name: Alistar, Unbreakable Vengeance
card.text: Trample Whenever Alistar is blocked, Alistar deals 1 damage to each other attacking and blocking creature Whenever Alistar deals lethal damage to a creature, return it to its owners hand instead.

card.name: Annie, Cursed by Kindle
card.text: When Annie enters the battlefield, create a legendary red artifact Bear token named Tibbers, Enchanted Bear with “5R: Tibbers becomes a 6/6 red bear creature until end of turn. this ability costs one less for each spell you’ve cast this turn.” Whenever a bear you control attacks, exile the top two cards of your library, you may play them as long as a bear has attacked this turn.

card.name: Anivia, The Eternal Frost
card.text: Flying When Anivia enters the battlefield, nonland permanents your opponents control don’t untap on their controllers next untap step. When Anivia dies, create a legendary 0/1 blue Egg token named Eggnivia. 3UUU, sacrifice an egg: You may cast Anivia from your graveyard without paying her mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Aphelios, Sibling of Faith
card.text: If Aphelios were to become a color and he already has 2 or more colors choose a color to lose. Aphelios gets +1/+1 for each of his colors. If Aphelios is white he has hexproof and the same is true for blue and Menace, black and trample, red and lifelink and green and first strike. {W}: Aphelios becomes white. {U}: Aphelios becomes blue. {B}: Aphelios becomes black. {R}: Aphelios becomes red. {G}: Aphelios becomes green.

card.name: Aurelion Sol, Starweaver
card.text: [+2]: Draw two cards, you may exile a card from your hand, if you do put a stardust counter on it. [-3]: For each player, exile up to one permanent that player controls. Put a stardust counter on each permanent exiled this way . [-9]: Make a copy of each spell in exile with a stardust counter, you may play those spells without paying their mana costs. Aurelion Sol, Starweaver can be your commander.

card.name: Bard, Cosmic Vagabond
card.text: [+1]: Each player makes a food token, draws a card and gains 3 life. [-2]: Tap up to two nonland permanents and put stun counters on them. An opponent may exile a permanents they control with a stun counter on it, if they do exile all permanents with stun counters on them. [-7]: Put any number of permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Bard, Cosmic Vagabond can be your commander.

card.name: Bel'Veth, Matron of Madness
card.text: Whenever Bel’Veth attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent that does not share a card type with a card in the void. If you do, draw a card. Revolt -- At the beginning of each endstep, if a permanent you control left the battlefield, if it was put into your hand or graveyard, you may exile it. If you do, it sinks into the void, then if there are 5 or more permanent in the void transform Bel’Veth. --- (Back): Shurima, the Lavender Sea

card.name: Shurima, the Lavender Sea
card.text: {T}: Return a permanent card from the void to the battlefield with a finality counter. {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of cards in the void. --- (Front): Bel'Veth, Matron of Madness

card.name: Blitzcrank, Rolling Golem
card.text: 1U, {T}: Exile target creature an opponent controls. 3R: Untap Blitzcrank, return a card exiled with Blitzcrank to its owners control. Blitzcrank deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

card.name: Caitlyn, Piltover Peacekeeper
card.text: Partner with Vi First strike Spells you control have flash as long as Caitlyn is blocking. Whenever a creature attacks you, a planeswalker or a battle you defend, look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library where X is the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Camille, Hextech Tactician
card.text: Camille can only attack players who have the monarch. When Camille enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. (The monarch draws a card at the beginning of their end step. Whenever the monarch is dealt combat damage by a creature, its controller becomes the monarch.) Whenever Camille attacks, exile target creature defending player controls with mana value less than the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Cassiopeia, Serpents Gaze
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a snake creature you control deals lethal damage to a creature, exile it instead of putting it into its owners graveyard. You may cast spells exiled with Cassiopeia for as long as they remained exiled. If you do, they are artifact art spells in addition to their other types. (Art creatures can’t attack, block and their abilities can’t be activated)

card.name: Cho'Gath, Hunger Incarnate
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a card is put into exile from anywhere. If Cho’gath is in the command zone or on the battlefield put a feast counter on it. Trample Cho’gath gets +X/+X, where X is the number of cards in exile with feast counters on it. Whenever Cho’Gath deals combat damage to player, each other opponent exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the number of cards that player owns in exile with feast counters on them.

card.name: Darius, Hand of Noxus
card.text: Menace Whenever a warrior deals combat damage to an opponent, that player gains a bleed counter. For as long as that player has one or more bleed counter, at the beginning of their upkeep that player looses life equal to the number of bleed counters on them then remove a bleed counter from them.

card.name: Draven, Glorius Gladiator
card.text: Haste {T}: Unattach an equipment you control: Draven deals X damage to any target where X is the mana value of the unequipped equipment, when a creature dealt damage this way dies create Y treasure tokens where Y is the number of adoration counters you have. Whenever you attach an equipment to Draven, gain a adoration counter. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ekko, Timewinder
card.text: {T}, put a card from your hand on top of your library: End the current phase. After this phase there is an additional upkeep, draw and main phase, activate only as a sorcery and only on your turn. “ahh, that fresh smart smell”

card.name: Elise, Spider Monarch
card.text: Menace Whenever a spider deals combat damage to a player, create a blood token. Whenever you cast a spider creature spell, tap target creature. If that creature is already tapped it does not untap on its controllers next untap step. You may cast spider spells from your graveyard, as an additional cost to cast spells this way sacrifice X blood tokens Where X is that spells mana value.

card.name: Evelynn, Maiden of Anguish
card.text: Goaded creatures can’t be blocked. When Evelynn enters the battlefield goad X creatures where X is the amount of times you have cast your commander from the command zone this game. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever a goaded creature attacks its controllers losses 3 life and discards a card unless that opponent sacrifices the creature or have you draw a card and gain 3 life.

card.name: Ezreal, Daring Archeoligist
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, the next spell you cast costs {2} less to cast. If it’s the second time resolving this ability, instead deal 2 damage to any target. If it’s the third time, exile Ezreal then return him to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

card.name: Fiddlesticks, Whispering Terror
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you don’t control a creature named Scarecrow Effigy, create a 0/1 colorless scarecrow artifact creature token named Scarecrow Effigy with “All creatures able to block Scarecrow Effigy do so.” Whenever a scarecrow you control deals combat damage to a player, you lose a life, draw a card and scarecrow spells cost {1} less to cast this turn.

card.name: Fiora, Honored Duelest
card.text: First strike, vigilance At the beginning of combat, choose an opponent at random. Whenever Fiora deals combat damage to that player this turn, gain 3 life and draw a card.

card.name: Fizz, Playful Prankster
card.text: Fizz enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter for each spell you’ve cast this turn. Whenever Fizz becomes the target of a spell or blocks, exile Fizz until the next end step. Counters remain on Fizz as he moves to any zone except for a player’s hand or library.

card.name: Galio, Bulwark of Demacia
card.text: Indestructible, Ward {10} Galio is not a creature as long as there is a slumber counter on it. Galio enters the battlefield with 20 slumber counters on it. Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell remove X Slumber counters from Galio Where X is that spells mana value, if no mana was spent to cast that spell counter it and Remove twice that many counters instead.

card.name: Gangplank, Burning Vengeance
card.text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a -1/-1 counter on it.) Whenever Gangplank or another pirate leave your graveyard, deal 2 damage to target player. Create a tapped treasure token. Pirates you control have unearth, their unearth cost is equal to their mana cost, you may spend mana only from treasures to pay this cost.

card.name: Garen, Might of Demacia
card.text: Whenever Garen deals combat to a player, that player can’t cast noncreature spells until the start of your next turn. If Garen is blocked by several creatures, he assigns combat damage to each creature blocking him instead of a single creature.

card.name: Gragas, Bottomless Barrel
card.text: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, make a food token. Whenever you sacrifice a food, the next spell you cast this turn costs {2} less and can be cast as though it had flash.

card.name: Graves, Destined Outlaw
card.text: Menace If a creature dealing combat damage to a player would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever Graves deals combat damage to a player, Face a Villainous Choice — Draw a card or make a treasure.

card.name: Gwen, Arcane Weaved
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Gwen becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may pay {X} where X is the spells spells mana value. If you do, Gwen phases out. Whenever Gwen attacks or blocks, you may sacrifice an aura attached to gwen. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed enchantment’s mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Hecarim, Endless Torment
card.text: Haste Whenever a nontoken creature dies, gain 2 life. At the beginning of combat you may pay up to 10 life, create that many 2/2 red black ghost horse tokens with haste.

card.name: Heimerdinger, Obsessed Inventor
card.text: Improvise, Ward {X} where X is the number of constructs you control. When Heimerdinger or another artificer enters the battlefield, create a */2 colorless artifact Creature token with defender and “this creatures power is equal to the number of artifact creatures you control.” Artifact creatures and artificers you cast have improvise.

card.name: Illaoi, Truthbearer
card.text: Tentacles you control have lifelink. Whenever Illaoi enters the battlefield or attacks, create a 1/1 blue tentacle creature token. Illaoi fights target creature you don’t control. Whenever Illaoi fights a creature an opponent controls, each tentacle deals 1 damage to it. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if it was dealt damage by Illaoi this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each tentacle you control.

card.name: Irelia, The Blade Dancer
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Irelia or another ally enters the battlefield, create an artifact equipment token named Quickblade that has “When Quickblades enters the battlefield attach it to a creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and if Equipped creature has exactly 6 equipment attached to it, the creature gains an additional +2/+2. Equip {2}”

card.name: Ivern, Reborn Mystic
card.text: When Ivern enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 elemental creature named Daisy. Whenever a land you control attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.

card.name: Janna, Tempest's Grace
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control with flying then put a flying counter on another creature you control. [-3]: Draw a card for each creature you control with flying. [-8]: You get an emblem with “ Whenever you cast a creature spell return target permanent an opponent controls to its owner’s hand. If that creature spell had flying return up to 3 permanents instead. Janna, Tempest’s Grace can be your commander.

card.name: Jarvan The Fourth
card.text: When Jarvan enters the battlefield, search your library for an aura or equipment with mana value X or less, attached to a creature an opponent controls, where X is the amount of times you’ve cast your commander this game. Equipment you control gain “equipped creature is goaded”. You may attach equipment to creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Jax, Grandmaster at Arms
card.text: Haste Activated abilities of artifacts attached to Jax can’t be activated unless they are equip abilities. Artifacts you control are equipment in addtion to its other types its equip cost is equal to half its mana value rounded up and give it “+X/+X where X is this artifacts mana value.” As long as Jax has 5 or more equipment attached to him. He gains +0/+5 First strike and vigilance.

card.name: Jayce, Protector of Today
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Choose one that hasn’t been chosen — • Deal 3 damage to any target. • Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. • Transform Jayce, Protector of Today. --- (Back): Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow

card.name: Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow
card.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever Jayce attacks, choose one that hasn’t been chosen — • Jayce gains +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. • Return target creature defending player controls to its owners hand. • Transform Jayce, Tyrant of Tomorrow. --- (Front): Jayce, Protector of Today

card.name: Jhin, Cold Open
card.text: WUBR, {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target, if the target would die from this effect increase the damage by 1 and choose an additional target, a maximum of 4 targets can be chosen this way. At the beginning of each end step, if exactly 4 creatures died this turn, create an artifact token named Grim Rose with “{T}, Sacrifice: Add 4 mana of any combination of colors to your mana pool.”

card.name: Jinx, Pow Pow and Fishbones
card.text: Cleave 2BRG (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.) Haste {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target [If a player was dealt damage this way deal that amount of damage to each creature and planeswalker that player controls.] Whenever a creature dies if it was dealt damage by Jinx this turn untap Jinx.

card.name: K'Sante, Umber Bastion
card.text: Ward {X}, where X is his toughness (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {X}.) Whenever a creature attacks, you may swap that creatures power and toughness. If you control that creature, it gains lifelink until and of turn. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature with lesser power, if no counter were placed this way, the creatures controller draws a card and gains 3 life.

card.name: Kai'Sa, Bound to Ruin
card.text: Haste {T}: Deal 1 damage to any target. as long as you control 2 or more other creatures, Kai’Sa has hexproof. whenever you activate Kai’Sa ability as long as you control 3 or more artifacts copy it twice you may choose new targets for the copies. As long as there are 3 or more instants or sorceries in your graveyard, if Kai’Sa would deal noncombat damage, she deals that much plus two instead.

card.name: Karma, Mantra Master
card.text: Kicker WU (You may pay an additional WU as you cast this spell.) When Karma enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target creature you control, if this spell was kicked put a shield counter on each creature instead. Whenever Karma attacks, you may remove any number of counters from permanents you control. If you do, exile target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the amount of counters removed this way.

card.name: Karthus, Voice of Ruin
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever another creature you control dies, put a requiem counter on Karthus. When Karthus dies, put X -1/-1 counters on each creature you don’t control and create X 1/1 white and black spirit tokens with flying, where X is the number of requiem counters on Karthus.

card.name: Kassadin, Riftwalker
card.text: Flash When Kassadin enters the battlefield, counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, Kassadin deals X damage to each other creature, where X is the countered spells mana value.

card.name: Kayle, Angel of Punishment
card.text: Flying, vigilance Rival with Morgana (As this creature enters the battlefield, if you control Morgana , you must phase out Kayle, Angel of Punishment or Morgana until the other leaves the battlfield.) While Morgana is Rivaled, Kayle gets +3/+3 and becomes a god in addition to her other types. Whenever Kayle attacks, exile target nonland permanent with mana value X or less until Kayle leaves the battlefield or is phased out, where X is her power.

card.name: Kayn, Shadow Assassin
card.text: Invisible (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities and can’t be blocked, This creature loses this effect if they deal damage.) Whenever Kayn deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • Put three +1/+1 counters on Kayn for as long as he has a counter on him he loses all other abilities and can’t be blocked. • Transform Kayn under defending players control. --- (Back): Rhaast, Form Unbound

card.name: Rhaast, Form Unbound
card.text: Lifelink Rhaast must attack each combat if able and can’t attack its owner or planeswalkers. Whenever Rhaast deals combat damage to a player, that player gains control of Rhaast. You control that player’s next turn. --- (Front): Kayn, Shadow Assassin

card.name: Kennen, Eye of the Storm
card.text: Storm Haste The legend rule does not apply to creatures you control named Kennen, Eye of the Storm. At the beginning of each end step, return Kennen to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Kha'Zix, Ever Adaptive
card.text: Whenever Kha’Zix enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile a creature from any graveyard, if that creature had first strike put a first strike counter on Kha’Zix the same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance. Kha’zix keeps his counters as he changes zones except for hand and library.

card.name: Kindred, Lamb of Light
card.text: Partner with Kindred, the Black Wolf (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kindred into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls, for as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it gains “whenever this creature dies each opponent draws a card and puts a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature they control”.

card.name: Kled, The Mountain Admiral
card.text: Partner with Skaarl, Immortal Companion You may cast equipment as though it costs {2} less. If you do, when that equipment enters the battlefield attach it to a creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature an opponent controls leaves the battlefield attach all equipment attached to that creature to Kled.

card.name: Kog'Maw, Looming Feast
card.text: Reach Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Kog’Maw. When Kog’Maw dies, return him to the battlefield at the beginning of the next upkeep with X +1/+1 counters, haste and trample, where X is his power, Exile him at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: LeBlanc, Mirrored Mystery
card.text: Creatures you control with a cipher cannot be blocked. Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell for the first time on each of your turns it has gains cipher. Cypher’s embedded by Leblanc can only trigger once each turn.

card.name: Lee Sin, Sightless Master
card.text: Multikicker 1U/R When Lee Sin enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls for each time it was kicked. Whenever a card is put into its owners hand from anywhere but their library, put a +1/+1 counter on Lee Sin then he deals damage equal to his power to its owner.

card.name: Leona, Solar Herald
card.text: It becomes day as Leona enters the battlefield. As long as it is day you may activate Leona’s abilities as though they had flash. If you do, it becomes night at the start of the next turn. [+1]: You may untap up to one tapped creature you control. If you do, you may tap target Nonland permanent an opponent controls. [-3]: Exile target tapped nonland permanent. [-6]: You get an emblem with “As long as its day, untap all permanents you control during each other player’s untap step.” Partner with Diana, Midnight Emissary Leona, Solar Herald can be your commander.

card.name: Lillia, Full Bloom
card.text: Trample When Lillia enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls for as long as you control Lillia. Whenever Lillia attacks, she gets +X/+X then look at the top X cards of your library, put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order, where X is the number of tapped creatures defending player controls.

card.name: Ice Witch Lissandra
card.text: {T}, Exert Lissandra: Tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controllers next untap step. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.) If a creature you control doesn’t untap during your untap step put 2 +1/+1 counters on that creature.

card.name: Lulu, Unknown Mischief
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a shield counter on target creature you control. 2RGGW, Remove any number of counters from permanents you control: Target creature you control gets three times +X/+X and becomes a giant in addition to its other types until end of turn, where X is the number of counters that were removed this way.

card.name: Lux, The Last Light
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a illumination counter on it. Magecraft -- whenever you cast or copy and instant or sorcery spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. {T} {W}: Deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of illumination counters on it. At the beginning of each end step, if that player controls 3 or more creatures with illumination counters on them, draw a card.

card.name: Malphite, Roaming Range
card.text: Malphite enters the battlefield tapped with 2 slumber counters on it. As long as Malphite has a slumber counter on it, it’s a land. (it’s not a creature) landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may remove a slumber counter from Malphite and create a 3/3 colorless golem creature token {T}: Add RR

card.name: Malzahar, Betrayer of Humanity
card.text: Spells you cast from anywhere but your hand Cost {1} less to cast for each time you have cast your commander from the command zone this game. Whenever Malzahar or a desert enters the battlefield under you control, each opponent exiles the top card of their library, it enters the void. You may play cards from the void and spend mana as though it were any color when casting spells this way.

card.name: Maokai, Eternal Evergreen
card.text: Maokai’s power and toughness are equal to the number of lands you control. Whenever Maokai attacks create a 3/3 sapling land creature token with “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add BG.” At the beginning of your end step, if you control 12 or more lands transform Maokai, Eternal Evergreen. --- (Back): The Roots of The Isle

card.name: The Roots of The Isle
card.text: {T}: Add BG, create a 3/3 sapling land creature token with “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add BG.” Whenever a land is put into your graveyard from anywhere, each opponent loses 3 life and you draw a card --- (Front): Maokai, Eternal Evergreen

card.name: Master Yi of Great Insight
card.text: First strike, vigilance Creatures you control with vigilance have “{T}: regenerate this creature.” Whenever a creature you control with vigilance attacks, you may tap that creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. At the beginning of your end step, gain X life where X is the total toughness of untapped creatures your control that attacked this turn.

card.name: Miss Fortune, Captain of Tyranny
card.text: Whenever a vehicle you control attacks, exile target creature you don’t control until the vehicle leaves the battlefield, its controller may cast if for as long as it is exiled. If they do, you create treasure tokens equal to its mana value. Vehicles you control have “{T} {X}: Put a creature card with mana value X or less exiled by this vehicle into its owners graveyard. Spend mana only from treasures to activate this ability.”

card.name: Mordekaiser, Immortal Bastion
card.text: Deathtouch Mordekaiser enters with 8 revival counters. Whenever a nontoken creature dies, remove a revival counter from Mordekaiser. As long as there are 1 or more revival counters on Mordekaiser, he is not a creature. When the last revival counter is removed, choose target creature an opponent controls then all other creatures except that creature and Mordekaiser phase out until your next turn.

card.name: Morgana, Angel of Redemption
card.text: Hexproof Rival with Kayle (As this creature enters the battlefield, if you control Kayle , you must phase out Morgana, Angel of Redemption or Kayle until the other leaves the battlfield.) While Kayle is rivaled, Morgana gets +2/+2 and becomes a god in addition to her other types. Whenever a nonland permanent enters the battlefield under an opponents control, if it was not cast, its controller exiles it unless they pay 3 life. If Morgana is a god they must pay 6 life rather than 3.

card.name: Nami, Seabound Archon
card.text: Whenever Nami or another merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, untap up to one tapped permanent and tap another untapped permanent. Whenever a merfolk you control becomes untapped, it gains +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Nasus, Ascended Strategist
card.text:
Lifelink Modified creatures you control have lifelink. Whenever Nasus or another modified creature deals lethal damage to a creature or planeswalker, Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you get a siphon counter. When Nasus dies, return it to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.
--- (Back): Siphoning Striker

card.name: Siphoning Striker
card.text: Equipped creature gets Lifelink and +1/+1 for each siphon counter you have. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, return target creature from your graveyard to your hand, if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of siphon counters you have return it to the battlefield instead. Equip {2} --- (Front): Nasus, Ascended Strategist

card.name: Nautilus, Sunken Titan
card.text: Delve Exile each card delved this way with a depth counter on it. Whenever Nautilus attacks, defending player makes a devious choice — You may return 2 cards with depth counter on them from exile to your hand, or you may cast a spell with a depth counter on it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Neeko, Delighted Curiosity
card.text: Kicker GU (You may pay an additional GU as you cast this spell.) Neeko enters the battlefield as a copy of a creature except it keeps it’s name, its still legendary. As you cast this spell, if it was kicked, copy it except the copies name is Not Neeko and it gains when it takes damage sacrifice it.

card.name: Nidalee, Ixtal's Protector
card.text: Non-Human creatures you control gain +1/+1 and have protection from humans Whenever three or more non-Human creatures deal combat damage, transform Nidalee Ixtal’s Protector. --- (Back): Jungle Cat Nidalee

card.name: Jungle Cat Nidalee
card.text: Non-Human Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have protection from humans and artifacts you don’t control. Whenever one or more non-Human creatures deal combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices an artifact and you draw a card. --- (Front): Nidalee, Ixtal's Protector

card.name: Nilah, Seven Handed
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you gain life from any source, each opponent gains that much life. At the beginning of your end step, for each opponent, draw a card unless its controller taps a creature with power greater than the amount of life they have gained this turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if its power is greater than Nilah’s, put a stun counter on that creature then put a +1/+1 counter on Nilah.

card.name: Nocturne, Living Nightmare
card.text: As Nocturne enters the battlefield, put a paranoid counter on each creature your opponents control, they gain “this creature can’t block horrors” and “At the beginning of your upkeep you may tap this creature to remove all paranoid counters. For as long as the creature has a paranoid counter on it.” Whenever Nocturne attacks, return a nightmare or horror creature with mana value X or less from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the amount of paranoid counters that are on permanents defending player controls.

card.name: Nunu, Savior of Winter
card.text: Partner with Willump Whenever a nontoken snow permanent enters the battlefield, create a snowball snow equipment token named Snowball with “equipped creature has ‘{T} {1}: Sacrifice snowball tap target creature.’”

card.name: Olaf, Might of Lokfar
card.text: Whenever Olaf attacks, he gains indestructible until your next end step. Whenever a creature is dealt lethal damage from Olaf, he deals damage equal to that creatures toughness to its controller and you.

card.name: Orianna, Manufactured Beauty
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped vehicle creature you control: Prevent X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn, where X is the power of the Vehicle. When Orianna enters the battlefield, create a colorless legendary vehicle artifact token named Ball with “Flying, haste and Ball gains +1/+1 for each tapped artifact you control and Crew 3” (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Golem Construct becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Ornn, The Living Bellows
card.text: When Ornn enters the battlefield, target equipment you control becomes a masterwork in addition to its other types. As long as it is a masterwork it gains an additional copy of its non equip abilities. As long as you control 3 Masterworks, Ornn gets Indestructible. 1RR: Target equipment becomes a masterwork, spend mana only from treasures to activate this ability.

card.name: Pantheon, God of War
card.text: If Pantheon has zero loyalty counters instead, transform him. [+1]: Deal 1 damage to any target, if Pantheon has 4 or more loyalty deal 3 damage instead. [-2]: Until your next turn, combat damage cant be dealt to creatures you control and all creatures attack each combat if able. Pantheon, God of War can be your commander. --- (Back): Atreus, Will of Man

card.name: Atreus, Will of Man
card.text: All permanents lose indestructible. Players can’t activate planeswalkers’ loyalty abilities. Whenever a card would be put into the graveyard exile it instead. --- (Front): Pantheon, God of War

card.name: Poppy, Hero of Demacia
card.text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature’s color.) card.name: Pyke, Drowned Vengeance
card.text: Invisible (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities and can’t be blocked, This creature loses this effect if they deal damage.) At the beginning of each end step, destroy target creature that was damaged this turn. If you do, create a treasure token and draw a card, if an effect or creature from one or more other players dealt damage to that creature this turn those players draw cards and each of those players create a treasure token.

card.name: Qiyana, Ixtal's Highness

card.name: Quinn, Birds Eye

card.name: Rammus, Rolling Hero
card.text: Haste Modified creatures you control assign damage with their toughness rather than their power. If a counter, equipment or an enchantment increases a creatures toughness it increases that creature’s toughness twice as much instead.

card.name: Rek'Sai, From Below
card.text: Morph RG Other Xer’Sai Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, create a 3/2 colorless Xer’Sai creature token with “at the beginning of your upkeep you may turn this creature face down as a 2/2 morph if you do it gains “Megamorph RG.””

card.name: Rell, The Price of Power
card.text: Haste Whenever an equipment enters the battlefield under your control, if it was cast from your hand, discover equipment X where X is its mana value. (“Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland equipment card with mana value X or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand”) Whenever Rell attacks, you may attach an equipment to Rell. If you do, attach all equipment that share a mana cost to Rell.

card.name: Renekton, Blood of Shurima
card.text: Trample, indestructible, ascend As long as its controller has cities blessing Renekton has lifelink. Whenever Renekton enters the battlefield or attacks, deal 1 damage to each player and each creature. Whenever Renekton dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you put it into its owner’s library third from the top. At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player gains control of Renekton. If they do, untap Renekton, he gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Rengar, Primal Hunter
card.text: Whenever a permanent card is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, if it does not share a card type with another card in any graveyard, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Rengar. Delirium -- if there are 4 or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Rengar can’t be blocked and if he would deal damage he does twice that much instead.

card.name: Riven, Noxian General
card.text: First strike, menace Only cast this side if Riven has not transformed this game. As riven enters the battlefield, each opponent makes 2 1/1 green and white citizen tokens. When no players control any citizens, transform Riven for the rest of the game. --- (Back): Riven, Ionia Redeemed

card.name: "Tristy"
card.text: “Tristy”s power and toughness is equal to the total mana value of artifacts used to craft it. When “Tristy” enters the battlefield, if there are fifteen artifacts used to craft it, destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control. Flamespitter — As long as there are three or more artifacts used to craft “Tristy” it has first strike and menace. Electro Harpoon — As long as there are six or more artifacts used to craft “Tristy” whenever it attacks it deals damage equal to the amount of artifacts used to craft it to any target. Scrap Shield — As long as there are nince or more artifacts used to craft “Tristy” it has ward {X} and indestructible where X is the amount of artifacts used to craft it. --- (Front): Rumble, Junkyard Menace

card.name: Ryze, Tethered to Power
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you control are arcane in addition to its other types. Spells you control have splice onto arcane, its splice onto arcane cost is equal to its cost. card.name: Samira, Stylish Daredevil
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, deal 2 damage to any target, if this is the sixth time this ability has resolved this turn deal 6 damage to each other creature instead. Whenever Samira deals lethal damage, create a treasure then exile the top card of your library you may play it this turn unless an opponent has Samira deal damage equal to the cards mana value to them.

card.name: Sejuani, Sister of Battle
card.text: Partner with Bristle, Battle Boar When Sejuani enters the battlefield, an opponent becomes the monarch. At the beginning of combat, if you are the monarch, tap target creature an opponent controls. whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it is not being declared as an attacker, Sejuani deals six damage to that creature if you are the monarch otherwise deal two damage instead, if excess damage is dealt this way put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Senna, The Redeemer
card.text: Partner with Lucian, Grim Purifier (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Lucian into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Senna’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in opponents graveyards. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library, you may play it this turn. If you do, you lose life equal to its mana value and you may tap up to one target creature.

card.name: Seraphine, Song of Hope

card.name: Sivir, Fortune Hunter

card.name: Vex, Shadowcaster

card.name: Vi, Impulsive Haymaker

card.name: Viego, The Ruined King

card.name: The Ruination

Exile this saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Front): Viego, The Ruined King

card.name: Viktor, Herald of Progress
card.text: Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for creatures in your graveyard and creature permanent cards that are not on the battlefield. At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice 3 artifacts. If you do, return target artifact from your graveyard to your hand. If this is the second time you may return it to the battlefield. If its your third search your library for an aritfact and put it onto the battlefield. and if it is your fourth time you may search your library for an artifact card put it onto the battlefield and return an artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Vladimir, Blood Craving
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you lose life for first time each turn, each opponent gets a blood counter, for as long as that player has one or more blood counter, at the beginning of their upkeep that player looses life equal to the number of blood counters on them then remove a blood counter from them. Whenever an opponent loses life from a blood counter you gain that much life.

card.name: Volibear, Aurora of Thunder
card.text: Indestructible, Trample As long as creatures you control have less than 15 power, Volibear is not a creature. At the beginning of each combat on each players turn, that players creature with the highest power gains haste and is goaded until end of turn then if that creature has less power than each of your creatures draw a card.

card.name: Warwick, Wild Experiment
card.text: Lifelink Fateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, if you were to gain life gain twice as much instead Warwick has haste as long as an opponent has less than half their starting life total Whenever Warwick attacks, he gains double strike if the defending player has less then half their starting life total.

card.name: Wukong, Living Cyclone
card.text: Haste Whenever Wukong becomes the target of a spell with a single target, make a non-legendary token copy of Wukong. Change the target of the spell to the token copy. Exile it at the next end step.

card.name: Xayah, Sleuthing Songbird
card.text: Partner Skulk Creatures you control have ward {X} where X is the number of creatures in your party. As long as you have a full party, clerics, rogues, warriors and wizards you control have hexproof and skulk. This Spell costs {1} less to cast for each time you have cast another commander from the command zone.

card.name: Xerath, Cursed by Envy
card.text: Xerath’s power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Xerath attacks, look at the top X cards of your library put half of them rounded down into your hand, where X is the difference between the cards in your hand compared to the cards in defending player hand. Whenever Xerath dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile Xerath and return him to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control then its owner gains control of target creature an opponent controls. --- (Back): Xerath, Saikhal Tomb

card.name: Xerath, Saikhal Tomb
card.text: Creatures can’t attack unless its controlled by its owner. {T}: {U} 2U: Transform Xerath, activate this ability if you control no permanents owned by other players. --- (Front): Xerath, Cursed by Envy

card.name: Yasuo, Wind of Resolve
card.text: Vigilance, bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) Whenever a samurai you control deals combat damage to a player, choose a creature they control, return it to its owners hand.

card.name: Yone, Displaced Duelist
card.text: Spiritbond (As Yone, Displaced Duelist enters the battlefield, they pair with a creature in your graveyard rather than a creature on the battlefield for as long as either creature is on the battlefield under your control or in your graveyard.) As Long as Yone is paired with a creature, each of those creatures gain first strike, Vigilance and haste and whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice this creature. If you do, return the creature it is paired with to the battlefield.

card.name: Yorick, Undead Shepherd
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don’t control a creature named Maiden of the Mist, you may sacrifice a creature, if you do create a Legendary 4/4 black wraith creature token named Maiden of the Mist, with “If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die exile that card and create a 2/2 black zombie creature token with decayed” (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Zombies you control have “This creature can’t be sacrificed”

card.name: Yuumi, Keeper of Book
card.text: Bestow 2GW (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it’s an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it’s not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 flying and lifelink. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile Yuumi, you may cast her for as long as she remains exiled. “We got the zoomies”

card.name: Zac, Indomitable Sludge
card.text: Whenever Zac attacks or dies, create a 0/1 green ooze creature token. Sacrifice another ooze: Zac gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Sacrifice four oozes: Return Zac from your graveyard to the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters.

card.name: Zed, Harmony in Shadow
card.text: Commander Ninjitsu BR If Zed or another shade or ninja creature would deal damage to a player, if that players life is less then half of their starting total, deal twice that much instead. At the beginning of your end step, Zed deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of effects or permanents that dealt them damage this turn.

card.name: Zeri, Volatile Spark
card.text: When Zeri enters the battlefield, Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.) Whenever Zeri attacks, you may remove any number of charge counters from permanents you control. If you do, deal X damage to any target and Zeri gets +X/+0 until end of turn Where X is the number of counters removed this way. Whenever Zeri deals combat damage to a player, distribute that many charge counters among permanents you control.

card.name: Ziggs, Crazed Detonation
card.text: {T}: Add CCC to your mana pool spend this mana only to active abilities of artifacts you control. Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, deal X damage to any target where X is the mana value of the sacrificed artifact.

card.name: Zilean, Keeper of Icathia
card.text: Flash If an opponent would take an extra turn, that player skips that turn and you take an additional turn after this one. Players may cast spells as though they had flash. If they do, they cost an additional {1} to cast.

card.name: Zoe, Mischief Incarnate
card.text: [0]: You may exile target instant or sorcery from an opponents graveyard, for as long as it remains exiled you may cast that spell, if you cast it this turn you may distribute X loyalty counters among planeswalkers you control, where X is the spells mana value. [-9]: Gain an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, copy it, you may choose new targets for the copy (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token)” Zoe, Mischief Incarnate can be your commander.

card.name: Zyra, Nature Given Form
card.text: {T}: Create a copy of the card rampant growth, you may cast the copy. Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 0/1 green plant creature token then Put a +1/+1 counter on each plant and each creature you control that is also a land. If a land were to be put onto the battlefield, if it was not put there from your hand, it enters as a 0/1 plant with two +1/+1 counters on it untap it. (It’s still affected by summoning sickness).

card.name: Milio, Gentle Flame
card.text: Elemental spells you control have assist. (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell’s cost.) Whenever another player pays mana on an elemental spell you control, that player copies that spell.

card.name: Kindred, The Black Wolf
card.text: Partner with Kindred, Lamb of Light (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kindred into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of each end step Kindred, the Black Wolf gains indestructible until end of turn and fights target creature an opponent controls who sacrificed a creature this turn.

card.name: Skaarl, Immortal Companion
card.text: Partner with Kled, the Mountain Admiral (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kled into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Reconfigure GU (GU: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn’t a creature.) While Skarl is equipped he is not an artifact. If equipped creature would die, instead exile Skarl, you may cast him from exile for as long as he remains exiled.

card.name: Naafiri, Pack of One
card.text: First strike, lifelink When Naafiri enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white dog token. Whenever Naafiri deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice any number of blood tokens. If you do, distribute twice that many +1/+1 counters among dog creatures you control. When Naafiri dies, return her to battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Naafiri, Blade of the Sands

card.name: Naafiri, Blade of the Sands
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 as long as it is a dog. Whenever equipped creature attacks, create two 1/1 white dog tokens tapped and attacking. Whenever a dog you control deals combat damage to a player, create a blood token then if you control 5 or more blood tokens unattach and transform Naafiri. Equip Dog {1} Equip {3} --- (Front): Naafiri, Pack of One

card.name: Briar, Blood Frenzy
card.text: Lifelink, haste Whenever Briar deals lethal damage to a creature, make a blood token. Whenever Briar attacks, she fights the creature with the lowest power if two or more creatures are tied for the lowest power you choose one of them. Whenever you sacrifice a blood token, put a +1/+1 counter on Brair. She gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Hwei, Bloody Blend
card.text: {T}: Add WBG. This mana can’t be spent on any generic cost. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of its colors. Whenever you cast a spell, mill an amount equal to its colors, then you may return a card with one less color from your graveyard to your hand from the cards milled this way.

card.name: Bristle, Battle Boar
card.text: Partner with Sejuani, Sister of Battle Trample Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, attach Bristle to that creature, that creature becomes mounted, (its still a creature but it can’t attack or block) attached creature gets trample and +X/+X where X is bristles power If you would put one or more counters on a creature you control, put that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Willump, Friend of Ice
card.text: Partner with Nunu Affinity for snow Whenever a snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, put a packed counter on target snowball you control, for as long as it has that counter it has “equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each packed counter and whenever this snowball is sacrificed to equipped creatures ability copy that ability for each packed counter on the snowball.”
